title: Rebel Heart
description: Rush and Gia's story continues in the gripping conclusion to the The New York Times best-seller, Rebel Heir....How to screw up a great summer in the Hamptons:Sleep with your boss. Check.Blow all your money on a rental you can't afford. Check.How to walk away from a man you fall in love with at the end of a summer:...I'll let you know when I figure it out.Rebel Heart is the second book in the Rush Series duet. Book one, Rebel Heir, is also available to listen now.
author: Penelope Ward
